short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will function as a simple todo list.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EfficientTask is a powerful and easy-to-use Todo List extension designed to help you manage your daily tasks efficiently. With its intuitive interface, you can add, edit, and organize your tasks with just a few clicks.
